title: Function Composition
code:
§function increment(n)
  result ← n ⊕ 1
  §transmit result
§end_function

§function double(n)
  result ← n ⊕ n
  §transmit result
§end_function

§begin main
  value ← 5
  §call increment(value)
  §call double(value)
§end
solution_description: defines multiple functions and calls them with the same input
hints: Two different functions operate on the same value
